name: Nitrosyl chloride
desc: Nitrosyl chloride is the chemical compound with the formula NOCl. It is a yellow gas that is most commonly encountered as a decomposition product of aqua regia, a mixture of hydrochloric acid and nitric acid. It is a strong electrophile and oxidizing agent.

images.alt: Skeletal formula of nitrosyl chloride with measurements
